name: Darien Gap
uniques: Units ending their turn on this tile take 50 damage when healing
All units must spend 3 extra movement points when inside the Darien Gap
Can be built just outside your borders

civilopediaText.text: The Gap of Darien, located in our world where it forms the border of Colombia and Panama, has shaped the history of the isthmus so greatly, even before civilization. An indomitable strip of hills, jungles and mountains, full of dangerous animals and illnesses, the Gap is the great wall that separates Panama from the rest of the continent.
